name: Sunil Kumar Nunia
bio: Currently working as a Digital Marketing Expert and Web Developer. He has two years of industry experiance in the field of Digital Marketing and Software Development. He has also been certified by various Organisations including Google. Currently he is also associated with many of the micro, small and medium enterprises in Bhubaneswar. He also leverages his extensive marketing experience to provide consultancy and insights to businesses looking to learn more about things like blogging, branding, and social media, SEO, web application and content marketing.
